string-array.name: warmup_array
string-array.item: What city do you live in?
Which room in your home feels the safest if you need to get away quickly?

string-array.name: still_in_array
string-array.item: Which form(s) of abuse are you experiencing?
Are you recording the incidents (dates, times, details)?
Name one person you can call immediately in an emergency.

string-array.name: plan_leave_array
string-array.item: When do you plan to leave?
Do you have a go-bag packed with essentials?
Where do you keep emergency cash or cards?
Have you identified a safe place to stay?

string-array.name: post_array
string-array.item: Has the abuser continued any contact?
Do you have a protection order? If yes, which type?
Are you using any safety tools (cameras, door alarms)?
Have you identified a safe place to stay?

string-array.name: follow_up_array
string-array.item: Which type of support would help most right now?
